name: Surprise visit
tip: Ashes are generally a bad card, but they can fill up your discard pile to make Veteran worth extra points.

name: Death
tip: Get a larger enough discard pile to play Death before you shuffle.

name: Cling
tip: Because after you shuffle you'll have to deal with the Ashes you've created, it can help to Cling onto your deck - prolonging the time until the consequences of your actions hit you.

name: Mine
tip: If you don't play the Ashes from Mine, it effectively delays your shuffle a full round.

name: Firebug
tip: Firebug and similar effects always discard the leftmost card from your hand.

name: Parch
tip: Parch can trade cheap cards for lots of points - winning early rounds by a lot.

name: Immolant
tip: Immolant effectively makes your self-discard effects earn you an extra point.

name: Spark
tip: Spark can discard other copies of spark with its effect, removing the downside.

name: Goliath
tip: Goliath to start a round is nearly unbeatable!
